title: Hey Riot, are there any more champs like Morderkaiser in the pipes?
body: I sure hope so. I love it how Marksman can now go in any position (except support :p) But the problem there is that no other role can really go bot with the support, so I'm hoping there'll be more champs like Morde (But more balanced), which will free up the marksman to go mid, top, or jungle. :)

replies.body:
I love experimenting with different kinds of champions in bot lane! Note how the position is called Bot in Ranked now, not AD Carry :P

As for whether there are any champions like Morde in the works, I can't really comment on that, but [here's a game](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TaCnOX7Tz1U) from last year's CBLoL (the Brazilian OPL) where Matsukaze and Espeon played a Yasuo/Janna bot lane against brTT and Dioud's Jinx/Thresh.

Yasuo is heaps of fun with either a hard-peel support like Janna or a hard-engage support like Leona :P
I always wanted to try having duo mid with APC + Support but I have yet to remember anytime I have a five man :P
I used to play duo tank bot lane for a bit of fun, it worked well early but you need some damage out of top, mid, and jungle
Hmm, makes sense to me. There are a lot of options for that too which is great, champs like Quinn/Lulu that can go pretty much wherever they want.
I really want to play the Twitch/Cassiopeia where Twitch is the support just getting the poison on the enemy for Cass to go ham.
Haha I've done it before! Also with Teemo/Cass! It's so much fun. Sometimes the other team just gets so confused like you can see that they don't know what's happening it's great hehe

Hmm, I could try that some time. Thanks for replying, even though you can't comment on it. :(

And I did specifically notice that! :L I guess the problem is that people still don't see it as viable. Anyway, I would just like a meta where people accept that the marksman doesn't have to be bot lane, so that the day of Jungle Kog may rise! Mwuahahahah! (But for reals though, jg Kog, with the right team comp, works really well, because he can use devourer, and his clear is a lot better than you would think.)

I may try that Yas lane some time. ;)
You must of missed Imaqtpie playing Ezreal support last night :p

:O I can't really watch streams in any decent quality, net's too slow, dare I ask how it went? Did it just turn into a kill lane or something? I'm a big believer in anyone with CC can support if you try hard enough, but Ez supp is a new one. How did he build?
It was a tough lane to watch. With QT's skill the enemy bot lane had no chance.. I think it was Ez/Lucian vs Blitz/MF. He just went full AP and had second most damage.
Dayum really no cc then. And MF is a pretty heavy hitter in her own right. Seems like something you should try once though ey :)

He would basically 1v2 the lane and push them back, wait for blitz to pull and just arcane shift to put in more damage. I am no where near Qt's level of mechanics so I won't be playing Ez any time soon :)

Haha I've only ever played Ez AP in ARAMs and with mixed results, I'm also very uncomfortable with no cc. Love me whose heavy CC champs like Nami. But I'll try any champ/build once....so long as I have at least a duo to carry me/bail me out when I do really bad.
I've only played Ez in ARAM's once, I also went full AP. I also love heavy CC champs, I mostly play Thresh and Alistar.. I need the tankiness ;)
Haha I'm the opposite, I avoid the tanky supports so I'm pretty bad at them. Well except Thresh, I do enjoy a good Thresh game. My favs are Nami > Lulu > Morg

I love Thresh, and Morg was my first support champion I played. But I put myself in bad spots all the time so I need to tank it up. I did try Nami after watching a few of your videos but didn't go so well :(

Haha I've played her so much I tend to autopilot now, which can be a good or a bad thing depending on the situation. I am trying to branch out into mid/jng some more though. I can't quite wrap my head around top, the melee trading/cs is really hard for me to understand the dynamic of, so often have pretty dodgy games there. I usually only try it when I have a jng in lobby with me.

That's the same for me with Thresh. I now play mini games to see if I can land hooks in between minions or if I can land blind hooks. I forget that there is a game to win sometimes haha. I try jungling every now and then but I still only play tanks in that role.
Lol I don't really watch streams! :p
play adc Thresh {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
That could actually work, because he's short range and a bit tankier, plus late game instead of falling off he and peel for Kog! (I'm secretly in love with Kog jg.)

> [{quoted}](name=Saisaikun,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=owhmOluR,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-02-10T16:06:31.580+0000)
>
> play adc Thresh {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

With support Blitz

Double bruiser bot lanes still work fairly well if you have a marksman in another lane or the jungle :)
A particularly nasty (and classic) combo is J4 + Leona, the burst at level 2 is ridiculous.
Hmmm, yeah. I suppose there are good combos. I guess the problem is that people still haven't changed their mindset.
I used to see a lot of J4 and Pantheon, that was a hard lane to lane against.
